dmca.title: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Twentieth Century Fox Intellectual Property
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 31, 2005 2:29 PM
To: dwilson@kmwlaw.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Twentieth Century Fox Intellectual
Property

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Dennis L. Wilson <dwilson@kmwlaw.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Monday, January 31, 2005, 12:32:50 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Unauthorized Use of Twentieth Century Fox Intellectual
Property

Dennis L. Wilson, Esq.

Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP

Penthouse Suite

9720 Wilshire Boulevard

Beverly Hills, CA 90212

Tel: (310) 248-3830

Fax: (310) 860-0363





January 28, 2005





VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL

AND CERTIFIED MAIL



The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207



abuse@theplanet.com



Re:       Unauthorized Use of Twentieth Century Fox Intellectual Property

(http://www.phonescoop.com/phones/p_forum.php?fm=m&ff=475&fi=170526)



Dear Sir or Madam:



Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation ("Fox") is the exclusive owner of
copyright, trademark and other intellectual property rights in and to
various television and motion picture properties including, but not limited
to "Family Guy" and "The Simpsons" (hereinafter the "Fox Copyrights and
Trademarks"). No one is authorized to distribute, reproduce, transmit, copy
or otherwise utilize the Fox Copyrights and Trademarks without the express
written permission of Fox.



We recently discovered that a web site for which you are the service
provider http://www.phonescoop.com/phones/p_forum.php?fm=m&ff=475&fi=170526
is offering visitors the opportunity to download unauthorized materials
protected by the Fox Copyrights and Trademarks in the form of streaming
videos via a link to a movie directory found at http://www.v710.mirrorz.com.



Fox has a good faith belief that the use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by Fox, its agent or the law, and violates
Fox's copyrights and trademarks in the Fox Copyrights and Trademarks.



As you may be aware, Internet Service Providers can be held liable if they
do not respond to claims of infringement pursuant to the requirements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA).  In accordance with the DMCA, we
request your assistance in the stopping the above web site's offering for
distribution and sale of the Fox Copyrights and Trademarks, as well as the
removal of any other infringement of Fox's rights.  We further declare under
penalty of perjury that we are authorized to act on behalf of Fox and that
the information in this letter is accurate.



Please contact me at your earliest convenience to discuss this matter
further.



Nothing in this letter shall be construed as a waiver or relinquishment of
any right or remedy possessed by Fox or any other affected party, all of
which are expressly reserved.



Very truly yours,



/s/



Dennis L. Wilson

Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP





DLW:atp

cc:        Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation
